mapper.select: select a.*, b.item_name, b.item_code, b.item_desc, b.manufacturer, b.origin, d.package_level, c.package_code, (a.qty * e.package_meas / d.package_meas) as uom_qty from order_out_details a inner join bas_item b on a.item_id = b.item_id inner join bas_package c on c.package_id = a.package_id inner join bas_package_items d on d.package_item_id = a.package_item_id inner join bas_package_items e on e.package_id = c.package_id and e.package_level = 1 where a.order_out_id = #{order_out_id} and a.status = #{status} order by a.line_no

select a.order_out_id,a.wave_id,a.order_out_code,a.owner_id,a.wh_id,a.order_type,a.order_biz_type, a.status,a.customer_id,a.dates,a.pickup_type, sum(b.qty / c.package_meas * d.package_meas * c.volume) as order_volume from order_out a inner join order_out_details b on a.order_out_id = b.order_out_id inner join bas_package_items c on c.package_id = b.package_id and c.package_item_id = b.package_item_id inner join bas_package_items d on d.package_id = b.package_id and d.package_level = 1
a.order_out_id in
#{item}
group by a.order_out_id,a.wave_id,a.order_out_code,a.owner_id,a.wh_id,a.order_type,a.order_biz_type, a.status,a.customer_id,a.dates,a.pickup_type

select a.*, b.dates, b.order_out_code, c.owner_name, d.customer_name, b.order_type, b.order_biz_type, d.customer_code from order_wave_details a inner join order_out b on a.order_out_id = b.order_out_id inner join bas_owner c on c.owner_id = b.owner_id inner join bas_customer d on d.customer_id = b.customer_id where a.wave_id = #{wave_id} order by b.order_out_code

select a.*,b.order_out_id,b.status as wave_line_status,a.wave_rep_status from order_wave a inner join order_wave_details b on a.wave_id = b.wave_id
a.wave_id in
#{item.wave_id}
and not exists(select 1 from order_out_details where status != 30 and status != 35 and b.order_out_id = order_out_id)
